Salt_Lake_City.State Arboretum of Utah: The State Arboretum of Utah (1,500 acres (6.1 km2)) is an arboretum located across the campus of the University of Utah in Salt Lake City, Utah, as well as on an additional site (147 acres (0.59 km2)) at the Red Butte Garden and Arboretum. The campus grounds and the Red Butte Garden are open to the public every day. The conservatory is open by appointment only.
